Package com.revs.grill

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.revs.grill.Database
@Configuration @PropertySource("classpath:application.properties") public class Database extends Object
The Database class represents a connection to the database and provides methods for executing queries and retrieving data. It uses the PostgreSQL database and requires the application.properties file to be present in the classpath.

  • Method Details

    • createConnection

      public static void createConnection()
      Creates a connection to the database if one does not already exist. This method uses the application.properties file to retrieve the database name, user, and password. It then establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database using the retrieved information.

    • getAllUsers

      public static List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of User objects representing all users in the database, or null if an error occurs

    • getUsersById

      public static List<User> getUsersById(List<Integer> userIds)
      Retrieves a list of User objects based on the provided user IDs.
      Parameters:
      userIds - the list of user IDs to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of User objects matching the provided user IDs, or null if an error occurs

    • insertUser

      public static int insertUser(User user, String password)
      Inserts a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing the user to be inserted.
      password - The password for the user.
      Returns:
      The generated ID of the inserted user, or -1 if an error occurred.

    • authenticateUser

      public static User authenticateUser(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to authenticate.
      password - The password of the user to authenticate.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object, or null if the user could not be

      Retrieves all roles from the database.
      Returns:

    • getRoleByEmail

      public static Role getRoleByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a role based on the provided email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to retrieve the role for.
      Returns:
      The Role object representing the role of the user with the provided email, or null if an error occurs

    • editRole

      public static int editRole(Role role)
      Edits the role in the database with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      role - The Role object containing the updated role information.
      Returns:
      The ID of the edited role in the database, or -1 if an error occurred.

    • insertRole

      public static int insertRole(Role role)
      Inserts a new role into the database.
      Parameters:
      role - The Role object containing the email and type of the role.
      Returns:
      The generated ID of the inserted role, or -1 if an error occurred.

    • deleteRole

      public static boolean deleteRole(Role role)
      Deletes a role from the database.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the role is successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getAllWorkLogs

      public static List<WorkLog> getAllWorkLogs()
      Retrieves all work logs from the database.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the generated ID of the inserted work log, or -1 if an error occurs

      Returns:

      public static int insertOrder(Order order)
      Inserts an order into the database.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the generated ID of the inserted order, or -1 if the insertion fails

    • editOrder

      public static boolean editOrder(Order order)
      Updates an existing order in the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object representing the updated order.
      Returns:
      true if the order was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteOrder

      public static boolean deleteOrder(Order order)
      Deletes an order from the database. This method removes the specified order from the Orders table and also removes any existing order-item junctions associated with the order.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the order was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • insertItem

      public static int insertItem(Item item)
      Inserts an item into the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The generated ID of the inserted item in the database, or -1 if the insertion failed.

    • editItem

      public static boolean editItem(Item item)
      Updates an item in the database with the provided information. This method updates the item's name, price, category, ingredients, start date, end date, picture, and item description.
      Parameters:
      item - The item object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteItem

      public static boolean deleteItem(int itemId)
      Deletes an item from the database based on the provided item ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getAllIngredients

      public static List<Ingredient> getAllIngredients()
      Retrieves all ingredients from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of Ingredient objects representing all ingredients in the database, or null if an error occurs during the database operation

    • getIngredientsById

      public static List<Ingredient> getIngredientsById(List<Integer> ingredientIds)
      Retrieves a list of ingredients based on the provided ingredient IDs.
      Parameters:
      ingredientIds - A list of ingredient IDs to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Ingredient objects matching the provided ingredient IDs, or null if an error occurs.

    • getIngredientsByName

      public static List<Ingredient> getIngredientsByName(String testName)
      Retrieves a list of ingredients from the database that match the given name.
      Parameters:
      testName - the name to search for (can be a partial match)
      Returns:
      a list of Ingredient objects that match the given name, or null if an error occurs

    • deleteIngredient

      public static boolean deleteIngredient(int ingredientId)
      Deletes an ingredient from the database and its relevant correlations in the junction table.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getAllOrders

      public static List<Order> getAllOrders(int limit)
      Retrieves a list of all orders from the database.
      Parameters:
      limit - The maximum number of orders to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Order objects representing the retrieved orders. Returns null if an error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • getOrdersByDateRange

      public static List<Order> getOrdersByDateRange(Date start, Date end)
      Retrieves a list of orders within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date of the range
      end - the end date of the range
      Returns:
      a list of orders within the specified date range, or null if an error occurs

    • getOrdersById

      public static List<Order> getOrdersById(List<Integer> orderIds)
      Retrieves a list of orders based on the provided order IDs.
      Parameters:
      orderIds - A list of order IDs to retrieve orders for.
      Returns:
      A list of Order objects matching the provided order IDs, or null if an error occurs.

    • getOrdersByStatus

      public static List<Order> getOrdersByStatus(String status)
      Retrieves a list of orders with the specified status from the database.
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the orders to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of orders with the specified status, or null if an error occurs

    • getAmtInventoryUsed

      public static Map<String,Integer> getAmtInventoryUsed(Date start, Date end)
      Retrieves the amount of inventory used between the specified start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date
      end - the end date
      Returns:
      a map containing the names of ingredients as keys and the total amount used as values

    • getSalesReport

      public static Map<String,Double> getSalesReport(Date start, Date end)
      Retrieves the sales report for a given time period.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date of the time period
      end - the end date of the time period
      Returns:
      a map containing the item names as keys and their corresponding total sales as values

    • getExcessIngredients

      public static List<Ingredient> getExcessIngredients(Date start)
      Retrieves a list of excess ingredients based on the specified start date. Excess ingredients are those that have been consumed less than 10% between the start date and the current date.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date to filter the ingredients
      Returns:
      a list of excess ingredients

    • getSellsTog

      public static List<com.revs.grill.SoldTogether> getSellsTog(Date start, Date end)
      Retrieves a list of items that are frequently sold together within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date of the range.
      end - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of SoldTogether objects representing the items that are frequently sold together.
